actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to establish a cancer center construction grant program.
short_title: Cancer Centers Assistance for Renovations and Expansion Act of 2020
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text:
Cancer Centers Assistance for Renovations and Expansion Act of 2020

This bill temporarily establishes and provides funds for a cancer center construction grant program for capital costs associated with research, prevention, or patient care infrastructure improvements.

titles.title: Cancer Centers Assistance for Renovations and Expansion Act of 2020
Cancer Centers Assistance for Renovations and Expansion Act of 2020
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to establish a cancer center construction grant program.
